:::Sky Lynx/Torca/Sideswipe/Ratchet:::

::Sky Lynx gets hit by one of blasts, and one bolt, his hull taking the 
damage for him. He fired 2 missles from one gun at Sixshot and 2 missles from 
the other gun at Sun Crusher::
~~~~~
::Torca gets hit by 1 missle but destroys the other. he gets hit by 1 stinger 
missle and the laser energy. he fired 7 explosive shells at Double Punch, 6 
at Injector, 6 at Bumblebee, and 6 at Reflector::
~~~~~
::Sideswipe dodges the grenade but gets hit by 1 of the missles.  Mech fluid 
was starting ot more steadily leak out.  he fires 1 missle and 13 shots at 
Ares, and 1 missle and 12 shots Double Punch::
~~~~~
::Ratchet was hit by 2 of the ion disks and 3 stinger missles.  he fired 1 
tusk missle and 15 shots from one gun at Manterror and 1 tusk missle and 15 
shots from his other gun at Bumblebee::

--part1_3e.557feb3.277bb305_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
